name: Err
description:
You are lost. Don't be found.

This is a small puzzle/horror game I made for the Global Game Jam. Your goal is to escape the forest by finding pieces of a torn-up map, and to avoid the thing that lurks in the darkness.

Given my previous issues with memory leaks, I've removed drawing code from this game entirely. I tested it on Chrome, Firefox, and Microsoft Edge, and it seemed to run fine. If you're still having problems, please try a different browser (Chrome works best for me).

How to Play

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Esc/P to pause
  • M to access map
